description: This file contains helper functions for managing workspace directories in a Python project, including retrieving workspace directory paths from environment variables and configuration files.

methods.name: get_workspace_dir_from_env
methods.description: Retrieves the workspace directory path from an environment variable, returning a Path object or None.

methods.name: get_workspace_dir_path
methods.description: Determines the workspace directory path based on a given root path, checking for a 'workspace' subdirectory or a directory specified in pyproject.toml.
